text: Yi tyasta manisa hun jo bhandachan ki allahale adesa gare anusara jabasam'ma kunai paigambara hami che'u yasto kurbani li'era a'umdaina jasala'i agole kha'ide'os tabasam'ma hamile visvasa gardainau. Bhanidinus ki yadi timi samco hau bhane mabhanda aghi kaiyaum paigambaraharu timra che'u khullarupama aneka camatkaraharuka satha yo pani lya'e juna timiharule bhanirakheka chau. Pheri uniharula'i timiharule kina maryau
